entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
